relationships.description: Harry used the bezoar to help Ron.
Slughorn ran for help after Harry used a bezoar to help Ron.
McGonagall and Madam Pomfrey turned up after Slughorn ran for help.
Madam Pomfrey helped care for Ron after he was brought to the hospital wing.
Hermione heard Harry recount the story of what happened to Ron.
George commented on how lucky it was that Harry thought of using a bezoar.
Ron was brought to the hospital wing after Harry used a bezoar to help him.
Harry will have to take Essence of Rue while he stays in the hospital wing.
